precaution: Remove any objects you may knock off from the table
instruction: Sit at the table with a spoon, a pair of chopsticks, a fork, and a container in front of you.
Place your right hand on the table near the utensils.
Use your right hand to pick up the spoon.
Place the spoon into the container.
Rest your hand on the table to take a brief break.
Pick up the pair of chopsticks with your right hand.
Place the chopsticks into the container.
Rest your hand on the table to take a brief break.
Pick up the fork with your right hand.
Place the fork into the container.
